## 2019 Schedules

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(DT)
library(emo)

temp <- list.files(pattern = "*.csv")
files <- lapply(temp, read.csv)

sched <- do.call(rbind, files)

sched <- sched %>%
            distinct()

sched$date <- as.Date(sched$Start.Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
class(sched$date)

sched$Sport <- gsub("WNBA", ji("basketball"), sched$Sport)
sched$Sport <- gsub("NWSL", ji("soccer"), sched$Sport)

sched %>% 
datatable(rownames = FALSE,
          options = list(
            pageLength = 15, 
            autoWidth = TRUE, 
            lengthChange = FALSE,
            paginate = TRUE,
            info = FALSE,
            columnDefs = list(list(
              className = 'dt-left', 
              targets = 0),
              list(className = 'dt-center', targets = 1))))

```
